parameters.name: TableRowIndex
parameters.description: Index of the pattern instance in the pattern table to suppress (see Remarks )

parameters.name: SuppressState
parameters.description: True to suppress the pattern instance, false to not

title: IDimPatternFeatureData.SetInstanceSuppressStateByIndex
description: Sets whether the pattern instance with the specified index in the pattern table is suppressed in this variable pattern feature.
signature:
System.String SetInstanceSuppressStateByIndex( 
   System.Int32
TableRowIndex
,
   System.Boolean
SuppressState
)

parameters.name: TableRowIndex
parameters.description: Index of the pattern instance in the pattern table to suppress (see Remarks )

parameters.name: SuppressState
parameters.description: True to suppress the pattern instance, false to not

returns: If the pattern instance is... Then Return Value is an... Suppressed Empty string indicating success Not suppressed Error string
